result.execSummary:
The defendant Deanna Dawn Dacquisto was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Deanna Dawn Dacquisto is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Deanna Dawn Dacquisto was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Deanna Dawn Dacquisto was found guilty of Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).
  • Deanna Dawn Dacquisto was found guilty of Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).
  • Deanna Dawn Dacquisto was found guilty of Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: from Atty. Cirilli regarding JOC error
Amended transcript of 7-26 with Correct TR case numbers.

10:00 AM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Deanna Dawn Dacquisto in court. Attorney Gary S. Cirilli in court for Deanna Dawn Dacquisto. Calling 22CM13 & 20TR1696 - 20TR1698. Cirilli state there is a proposal - no agreement yet - would like to set out. Bond continued. adj. 10:03 AM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:58 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Deanna Dawn Dacquisto in court.  Attorney Gary S. Cirilli in court for Deanna Dawn Dacquisto. 
Also calling 20tr1696-1698.
Cirilli statement to status- close to resolution - request additional PTC.
Bail continued
Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
2:43 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Deanna Dawn Dacquisto in court. Attorney Gary S. Cirilli in court for Deanna Dawn Dacquisto. Calling 22CM13 & 20TR1696 - 20TR1698. Cirilli states case is not resolved - waiting for discovery. Bond continued. adj. 02:45 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:35 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Deanna Dawn Dacquisto not in court, Attorney Gary S. Cirilli appeared by video for Deanna Dawn Dacquisto. Calling 22CM13, 20TR1696, 20TR1696 & 20TR1698. Cirilli has authorization to appear. In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea. Bail continued. adj. 02:37 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 29, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: No possession or use of prescription medications or controlled substances without valid prescription and ONLY in dosage - manner as prescribed.

2:59 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Deanna Dawn Dacquisto appeared by video. Calling 22CM13, 20FO1054, 20TR1696 & 20TR1697 & 20TR1698. 22CM13 set for an initial appearance. Defendant needs to be provided copy of complaint, right to counsel. Court questions Defendant on video appearance/residence. Pfeifer statement to bail. Court sets bond. Defendant to come in to COC office to sign bond. adj. 03:03 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
